title: Hunter AFK (50)
comment_one: *1= Boost str to have 308 accuracy (Sand castles) as thats the zone you will be spending quite some time at this level.
comment_two:
You want to level up "Piercing Arrow" and "Kung Fu Kick".
 Then increase damange with "Have Another", "High polymer limbs", and "Veins of the Infernal".
comment_three:
Level the 2 damaging skills evenly.
*10 = Use these to bring your damage up as needed to hit damage cap
notes: Damaging Skills directly increase AFK damage (multiplicative). The damage cap for a zone is the Monsterâ€™s HP. AFK damage increases above this cap will not increase your gains. AFK Damage = Minimum damage * Active Skill AFK multiplier
